# Cloudinary Vue SDK - Storybook

[Cloudinary](https://cloudinary.com) is a cloud-based service that provides an end-to-end image and video management solution including uploads,storage, manipulations, optimizations and delivery. All your media resources are optimized and delivered through a fast CDN using industry best practices.

## Features

The Vue SDK developed by Cloudinary provides a solution for smart on-demand image and video manipulations within your Vue.js-based applications, including the following:

* Responsive and reactive image & video components.
* Auto-detect optimized format per browser for images and videos.
* Fast loading speed with progressive images.
* Out-of-the-box placeholder for image components.
* Out-of-the-box accessibility support.
* Lazy loading image and video components.
